string.name: temp
string.description: Template model (unit sphere) used for the spherical parameterization

string.name: input
string.description: Path to directory with subject surface model files

string.name: coeff
string.description: Path to list of spherical harmonic coefficients

string.name: ref
string.description: Reference model (unit sphere) for the final surface remeshing

string-vector.name: property
string-vector.description: List of properties that are included in the resulting mesh file
